rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample lighting and storage for shoes and coats.
Central seating area oriented towards the east per Vastu principles, ensuring natural light. Includes large windows to connect with the courtyard.
Adjacent to the living room for family meals, overlooking a partial view of the garden.
Functional kitchen space located near the dining area. Complies with local building norms for ventilation and safety.
Separate room for guests, positioned on a side of the apartment to ensure privacy.
Dedicated workspace located in a quiet area with natural lighting, ensuring minimal distractions.
Storage for household appliances and cleaning supplies.

openings.description: Provides secure entry, aligning with Vastu guidelines for north-facing entrances.
Window opening into the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom oriented towards the northeast, adhering to Vastu principles for health and prosperity.
Secondary bedroom designed for additional family members, ensuring privacy with a private balcony.
Third bedroom providing sleeping space for extended family members.
Shared bathroom located centrally to maximize convenience while adhering to local norms.

openings.description: Provides access to a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Ensures safe vertical circulation between floors, designed according to building codes.

rooms.description: An expansive roof garden that acts as a continuation of the central courtyard, offering space for relaxation and gatherings.

openings.description: Provides access to the roof terrace ensuring adherence to safety norms.
